name: libiada-web
description: The purpose of LibiadaWeb web service is sequence analysis and analysis of ordered data arrays using mathematical tools of FOA - formal order analysis.   In particular, LibiadaWeb processes:   1.  Genetic sequences (in the form of DNA / RNA triplets, amino acids).   2.  Literary works (in the form of letters and normalized (using [phpMorphy](http://phpmorphy.sourceforge.net/dokuwiki/)) words).   3.  Musical works (in the form of notes, measures and fmotifs).   4.  The arrays of numerical measurements of custom nature.   5.  Images (using [ImageSharp](https://sixlabors.com/products/imagesharp/)).
